SENTIENT SPECIES:
Giant Robots: Purely mechanical lifeforms, artificially created. They have bilateral symmetry. They are meditative and believe in the inherent superiority of their species. They were created by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids on Krantor II as servants in 1657.
	Their Stats are: STR: 2 DEX: 1 CON: -2 INT: 1 CHA: 1
Orange Koboldoids: Eat pretty much anything, including one another. Disturbingly fond of skulls. They have orange skin. They have bilateral symmetry. They are humorless and always willing to listen. They first evolved on Krantor II in 1614.
	Their Stats are: STR: 2 DEX: -1 CON: 1 INT: 1 CHA: 0
Blue Trolloids: They have lost the ability to reproduce naturally, and compensate for this with a focus on science and paranoia. They have blue skin. They have bilateral symmetry. They are hyperactive and believe in the inherent superiority of their species. They first evolved on Krantor II in 1631.
	Their Stats are: STR: 1 DEX: -1 CON: -1 INT: 0 CHA: -2

CIVILISATIONS:
THE EMPIRE OF ORANGE KOBOLDOIDS:
An ancient, corrupt, fantastically wealthy, primitive Empire of 9 planets, with 13 billion inhabitants.
Major populations:
4 billion Orange Koboldoids.
5 billion enslaved Giant Robots.
4 billion enslaved Blue Trolloids.
It is at peace with the Republic of Koboldoids and Robots.

	Their Stats are: STR: -2 DEX: -1 CON: -1 INT: -1 CHA: 0
THE REPUBLIC OF KOBOLDOIDS AND ROBOTS:
An ancient, corrupt, fantastically wealthy Republic of 8 planets, with 6 billion inhabitants.
Major populations:
3 billion Orange Koboldoids.
3 billion enslaved Blue Trolloids.
It is at peace with the Empire of Orange Koboldoids.

	Their Stats are: STR: -3 DEX: -2 CON: -2 INT: -2 CHA: -1
PLANETS:
GYKOP I
A life-bearing planet.
Deep Impenetrable Seas: Hundreds of kilometres down, water turns into ice from pressure.
Strata:
A Teleport Gate created by the rogue AI Mind 271 in 1299, buried in 916.
The ruins of a grand palace, built by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids in 1829, destroyed in 916 by a time vortex.
The ruins of a orbital elevator, built by the Republic of Koboldoids and Robots in 1806, destroyed in 916 by a time vortex.
The ruins of a complex of arcologies, built by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids in 1740, destroyed in 916 by a time vortex.
The ruins of a skull pit, built by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids in 1664, destroyed in 916 by a time vortex.
Remnants of a culture of Immortal Orange Robots with Threefold Symmetry that collapsed by a time vortex in 916.
Remnants of a culture of Orange Koboldoids that collapsed by a time vortex in 916.
Remnants of a culture of Giant Robots that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 1825.
The ruins of a vast museum, built by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids in 1719, destroyed in 1822 during the invasion of the Empire of Orange Koboldoids.
The ruins of a skull pile, built by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids in 1667, destroyed in 1822 during the invasion of the Empire of Orange Koboldoids.
Remnants of a culture of Blue Trolloids that collapsed from mass hysteria in 1814.
The ruins of a orbital elevator, built by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids in 1670, destroyed in 1796 through orbital bombardment by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids.
Remnants of a culture of Blue Trolloids that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 1708.
Remnants of a culture of Purple Dwarfoids that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 1538.
A block of time ice, encasing Subroutine 039, Autarch of the Second Church of Four-Armed Orange Robots created by the rogue AI Experiment 79 in 1361, lost and buried when the Republic of Antoids transcended in 1402.
The ruins of a vast underground vault, built by the Church of Amorphous Black Robots in 1102, destroyed in 1166 when the planet was scoured by a superweapon of the Empire of Amorphous Black Robots.
The ruins of a vast museum, built by the Third Empire of Tiny Robots in 945, destroyed in 988 .
Remnants of a culture of Scaly Grey Antoids with Five-fold Symmetry that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 928.
Remnants of a culture of Two-Headed Red Robots that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 747.
Remnants of a culture of Slim White Robots that collapsed through predation by ultravores in 625.

XARLAN III
A barren planet of the Empire of Orange Koboldoids.
It is somewhat polluted.
A mining base, built by the Republic of Koboldoids and Robots in 1743
Vast Empty Plains: Brown, dusty and featureless, their monotony is broken only by the occasional rivulet around which cluster many flying animals.
Strata:
The ruins of a mining base, built by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids in 1713, destroyed in 1740 due to orbital bombardment by the Kingdom of Koboldoids, Trolloids and Robots.
The ruins of a vast museum, built by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids in 1681, destroyed in 1706 by a nova.
The ruins of a skull pit, built by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids in 1671, destroyed in 1706 by a nova.
The ruins of a skull pile, built by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids in 1667, destroyed in 1706 by a nova.
Remnants of a culture of Giant Robots that collapsed due to a nova in 1706.
The ruins of a military base, built by the Empire of Slim Robots in 1413, destroyed in 1544 after the transcendence of the Kingdom of Dwarfoids and Antoids.
Remnants of a culture of Scaly Grey Antoids that collapsed due to a nova in 778.
Remnants of a culture of Flying Koboldoids with Long Tails that collapsed due to orbital bombardment by the Church of Scaly Grey Antoids in 716.
A Time Machine created by the rogue AI Experiment 186 in 1832, lost in 358.

HYLUS II
A barren planet.
It is somewhat polluted.
Musical Caves: The wind whistles through massive caves and across rocks, producing an eerie music.

The ruins of a science lab, built by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids in 1656, destroyed in 916 by a time vortex.

A Killer Meme created by the rogue AI Mind 271 in 1749, forgotten in 1765.
The wreck of the flagship of Captain Frix Johnson, destroyed by a giant spaceborne purple crystal.
The shattered wrecks of 2 spaceships of the fleet of Captain Frix Johnson, destroyed by a giant spaceborne purple crystal.

Remnants of a culture of Scaly Grey Antoids that collapsed from the Yellow Pox in 1176. The Yellow Pox, which affects Scaly Grey Antoids, slumbers in their corpses.
Fossils of ultravores that went extinct in 1103.
Fossils of radiovores that went extinct in 1103.
Fossils of beautiful flying creatures that went extinct in 1103.

LUMEN I
A barren planet of the Empire of Orange Koboldoids.
A mining base, built by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids in 1830
Periodical Darkness: Every thirteen years, the orbit of this planet synchronizes with that of a planet closer to its stars, causing a night that lasts for weeks.
Deep Impenetrable Seas: Hundreds of kilometres down, water turns into ice from pressure.

The ruins of a mining base, built by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids in 1785, destroyed in 1829 due to orbital bombardment by the Republic of Koboldoids and Robots.

A life-bearing planet of the Empire of Orange Koboldoids.

It is populated by:
4 billion enslaved Blue Trolloids
A skull pit, built by the Empire of Orange Koboldoids in 1678

Poison World: Mineral deposits produce a steady stream of toxins that makes survival extremely difficult.
Titanic Mountains: Mountain ranges so vast they poke out of the atmosphere into space.

A barren planet.
It is somewhat polluted.
Titanic Mountains: Mountain ranges so vast they poke out of the atmosphere into space.

HISTORY:
0:
IN THE BEGINNING, ALL WAS DARK.
THEN, PLANETS BEGAN TO FORM:
Gykop I, Xarlan III, Hylus II, Mycon III, Gylow IV, Lumen I, Ayloq I, Erebus I, Freia V, Eelut I, Cykov IV, Sativex VI, Tabernak V, Mycon III, Cymos V, Bemup II, Eukip I, Taranis I, Chroma I, Krantor II, Goler II, Genur III, Sativex VI, Cenut VI
3:
A gigantic network of caves forms on Taranis I.
8:
Life arises on Hylus II
11:
Life arises on Eukip I
14:
Deep impenetrable seas form on Ayloq I.
19:
Life arises on Krantor II
27:
Gas bags evolve on Hylus II.
34:
Brain parasites evolve on Krantor II.
37:
Titanic mountains form on Cymos V.
41:
Ultravores evolve on Krantor II.
44:
Life arises on Bemup II
46:
Beautiful aurorae play across the skies of Cenut VI.
49:
Deposits of huge gems form on Freia V.
50:
Sentient Orange Dwarfoids with Long Tails arise on Hylus II.
57:
Tabernak V has become a poison world.
59:
Sentient Flying Orange Ursoids with Long Tails arise on Krantor II.
61:
Beautiful flying creatures evolve on Eukip I.
64:
Sentient Two-Headed Humanoids arise on Bemup II.
68:
Sentient Four-Armed Humanoids with Giant Eyes arise on Krantor II.
74:
The Orange Dwarfoids with Long Tails on Hylus II achieve spaceflight and organise as a Military Dictatorship, the Empire of Orange Dwarfoids with Long Tails.

The Republic of Antoids, Catoids, Koboldoids and Robots secedes from the Empire of Slim Green Antoids, leading to a civil war!
The Empire of Slim Green Antoids attack and raze Erebus I, a colony of the Republic of Antoids, Catoids, Koboldoids and Robots.
The pirate White Antenna receives tribute from Sativex VI of the Empire of Slim Green Antoids.

Overcrowding on Erebus I leads to increased pollution.

The Second Empire of Slim Green Antoids build a military base on Cykov IV.
The Second Empire of Slim Green Antoids enters a dark age. Decrepitude set to 0,  was 362
The Second Empire of Slim Green Antoids conquer Chroma I, a colony of the Church of Catoids, Koboldoids and Robots.
Overcrowding on Bemup II leads to increased pollution.
Overcrowding on Eukip I leads to increased pollution.
Overcrowding on Krantor II leads to increased pollution.
The Church of Catoids, Koboldoids and Robots attack and raze Cymos V, a colony of the Second Empire of Slim Green Antoids.

They discover: The ruins of a complex of arcologies, built by the Church of Catoids, Koboldoids and Robots in 611, destroyed in 613 due to orbital bombardment by the pirate White Antenna. They discover: Remnants of a culture of Four-Armed Yellow Catoids that collapsed due to orbital bombardment by the pirate White Antenna in 613.

Artists on Gylow IV create a statue of the Empress of the Empire of Antoids and Robots. 
An expedition led by Captain Tkukk explores Ayloq I. They trade with the local Scaly Grey Antoids. They discover: Remnants of a culture of Two-Headed Red Robots that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 917. They discover: Remnants of a culture of Flying Koboldoids with Long Tails that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 750. 
The Second Empire of Tiny Robots defeats the pirate Blue Node.

They discover: Remnants of a culture of Scaly Grey Antoids that collapsed from the Blue Fever in 732. The Blue Fever, which affects Two-Headed Green Robots with Threefold Symmetry, Scaly Grey Antoids and Two-Headed Red Robots, slumbers in their corpses.  Unfortunately, they catch the Blue Fever from their exploration of the ancient tombs, infecting Genur III upon their return.They discover: Remnants of a culture of Slim White Robots that collapsed due to orbital bombardment by the Church of Two-Headed Red Robots in 723.
